survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from university students regarding their overall satisfaction with academic services, campus facilities, and student support systems.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of teaching in your courses?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced with clear labels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of teaching in your courses?

questions.question_text: Which of the following campus facilities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options cover major facilities.

script.question_text: Which of the following campus facilities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the availability of academic advisors?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency. Label each option clearly.

script.question_text: How would you rate the availability of academic advisors?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university's student support services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university's student support services?

questions.question_text: How often do you attend extracurricular activities or events on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale with clear time references.

script.question_text: How often do you attend extracurricular activities or events on campus?

questions.question_text: Which of the following resources do you find most helpful for your studies? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize top resources. Randomize option order to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with max selections enforced.

script.question_text: Which of the following resources do you find most helpful for your studies? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the university's online learning platforms (e.g., LMS, lecture recordings)?
questions.client_notes: Use the same 5-point Likert scale as Q1 for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the university's online learning platforms (e.g., LMS, lecture recordings)?

questions.question_text: What is your year of study?
questions.client_notes: Include all relevant years. Option for extended study if applicable.

script.question_text: What is your year of study?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the university's communication regarding important updates (e.g., deadlines, events)?
questions.client_notes: Use the same 5-point scale as Q3 for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the university's communication regarding important updates (e.g., deadlines, events)?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the university experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any unaddressed feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the university experience?
